ermin Courtierdale was a famous Harper master who operated out of Amn during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Dermin tutored many young Harpers, including the druid Jaheira, who he had originally recruited into the organization.
He was a member of the Athkatlan Harpers, who operated out of a luxurious estate near the citys docks. His associates included Galvarey, Berinvar, Rylock, among others.
As of the , Dermin, Galvarey and other Athkatlan Harpers were conducting themselves in a manner quite out of line with the greater organization. They lived a lavish life at Galvareys estate, and resorted to murdering those they perceived as their enemies.
